poemsDataJson.list_full: 恨(うら)みわび ほさぬ袖(そで)だに あるものを 恋(こひ)に朽(く)ちなむ 名(な)こそ惜(を)しけれ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Even when your hate//Makes me stain my sleeves with tears//In cold misery,//Worse than hate and misery//Is the loss of my good name.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Urami wabi|Hosanu sode dani|Aru monoo|Koi ni kuchinan|Na koso oshi kere
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: こひにくちなむ なこそをしけれ
poemsDataJson.author: 相模(さがみ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 恋の浮き名に朽ちてしまいそうな自分を惜しむ心
